section.title: Action
section.para: An Action encapsulates a command that an can execute.
An Action typically involves one of:

listitem.para: The itself - such as launching and exiting the application, or adjusting a setting of the application.
An as a whole - such as suspending and resuming an activity, or adjusting settings or meta-data of the activity
A part of an - for example if the activity involves viewing a video, such as starting, stopping or pausing the video.
An interaction with a user interface element - such as entering a character into a text field.
Another action - such as undoing and redoing another action, or recording and replaying actions
